strings.results.brief.title: Brief overview
strings.results.extensive.title: Extensive diagnostics
strings.label.name: name
strings.note.noIssues: No immediate issues found. System looks healthy.
strings.suggest.checklist.brief: Start working checklist: confirm essential tools are installed and builds run.
strings.suggest.checklist.extensive: Max performance checklist: focus on steps that improve speed and efficiency.
strings.suggest.memory.low: Low free memory: close unused apps or restart to free RAM.
strings.suggest.memory.veryHigh: RAM use >= 90%: close heavy apps, pause builds, or increase system RAM.
strings.suggest.memory.high: RAM use >= 80%: consider closing apps or increasing RAM if this is common.
strings.suggest.memory.reserve: Keep 20% free RAM for cache and OS tasks; 10% is the minimum to avoid slowdowns.
strings.suggest.cpu.high: High CPU load: check Task Manager for heavy processes.
strings.suggest.internet.failed: Internet check failed: verify your connection or firewall.
strings.suggest.internet.latency: High internet latency: try switching networks or restarting the router.
strings.suggest.os.updates: macOS updates available: install the latest updates.
strings.suggest.gpu.full: Run full diagnostics to include GPU and process details.
strings.suggest.ide.cap: JetBrains IDE cap detected: increase IDE heap size if performance is slow.
strings.suggest.wifi.weak: Weak Wi-Fi signal (<60%): move closer to the router or switch to Ethernet.
strings.suggest.wifi.weakRssi: Weak Wi-Fi signal (low RSSI): move closer to the router or switch to Ethernet.
strings.suggest.power.plan: Power plan is not set to high performance: switch to Best/High Performance while coding or building.
strings.suggest.vscode.extensions: VS Code: disable unused extensions and exclude build/output folders from file watching and search.
strings.suggest.jetbrains.tune: JetBrains IDEs: disable unused plugins, exclude build output from indexing, and raise heap size if needed.
strings.suggest.vs.parallel: Visual Studio: enable parallel project builds and unload unused projects to reduce solution load time.
strings.suggest.xcode.derived: Xcode: clean DerivedData when indexing or build times spike.
strings.suggest.android.accel: Android Studio: enable emulator hardware acceleration and keep the Gradle cache on fast storage.
strings.suggest.node.lts: Node.js: use the latest LTS release and keep project dependencies on SSD storage.
strings.suggest.ts.incremental: TypeScript: enable incremental builds or project references for large codebases.
strings.suggest.python.venv: Python: use virtual environments to keep installs isolated and fast.
strings.suggest.java.lts: Java: use a current LTS JDK and enable build caches (Gradle/Maven) for faster rebuilds.
strings.suggest.docker.windows: Docker Desktop (Windows): use WSL2 backend and tune CPU/RAM limits for your workload.
strings.suggest.docker.mac: Docker Desktop (macOS): tune CPU/RAM limits and file sharing (VirtioFS if available).
strings.checklist.osDrivers: Update OS and device drivers (GPU, chipset, Wi-Fi/LAN) to the latest stable versions.
strings.checklist.powerPlan: Use a High Performance/Best Performance power plan while coding or building.
strings.checklist.startupApps: Disable or trim startup apps and background services you do not use.
strings.checklist.diskSpace: Keep at least 20% free disk space; run disk cleanup and remove large temp files.
strings.checklist.ssd: Prefer SSD storage for projects; avoid heavy builds on slow external drives.
strings.checklist.visualEffects: Reduce visual effects/animations for snappier UI.
strings.checklist.antivirus: Exclude project folders (node_modules, build, dist) from real-time antivirus scanning.
strings.checklist.wifi: Use Ethernet or strong 5GHz Wi-Fi; update router firmware and reboot periodically.
strings.checklist.dns: Set DNS to a fast provider and verify low latency for package downloads.
strings.checklist.browser: Limit browser tabs and close heavy apps during builds.
strings.checklist.cliTools: Keep CLI tools up to date (Node.js, npm, Git, Docker, Java).
strings.checklist.reboot: Reboot after major updates to clear stale processes and locks.
strings.note.speedtest.singleSource: Result is based on one source.
